name: SCOOMART
description:
Explore the gas station, searching for clues that will gradually unveil the haunting history of SCOOMART. Will you uncover the truth or become another victim of the malevolent force lurking within?

Are you ready to face your deepest fears and uncover the chilling truth? Will you escape the clutches of the ancient paranormal beast, or will you become another lost soul in the depths of horror.

Please take note this game was a first attempt at a REAL project. Its also a silly SHORT game/experience dedicated to my pet dog Skye. She is presented in the end screen if you are interested!
